net.sf.wubiq.utils

Class ServerProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.wubiq.utils.BaseProperties
      • net.sf.wubiq.utils.ServerProperties

  • public class ServerProperties
extends BaseProperties
    Collects the value from wubiq-server.properties. This file search is as followed. It is first searched in the folder in the system file where the client is run. If not found then it is look up in the default paths of java class paths.
    Author:
    Federico Alcantara

        public java.lang.Integer getPdfToImageDotsPerInch()
        Pdf to image dots per inch. Default value is 144dpi.
        Returns:
        Dots per inches for image conversion, never less than 72 dpi.

      • getUsers

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getUsers()
        Gets the list of users with their privileges. The list is gather from a comma separated list of elements in the form userid:password.
        Returns:
        List of users.

      • isValidUser

        public boolean isValidUser(java.lang.String userId,
                           java.lang.String password)
        True if the user / password combination is found in the map of users.
        Parameters:
        userId - Id of the user to search for.
        password - Password.
        Returns:
        True if the user/password combination.

      • get

        public java.lang.String get(java.lang.String key,
                            java.lang.String defaultValue)
        Description copied from class: BaseProperties
        Gets a value from properties file.

        Parameters:
        key - Key to search for.
        defaultValue - Value to return in case key is not found in properties.
        Returns:
        Found value or default value.

      • getProperties

        protected java.util.Properties getProperties()
        It lookup for wubiq-server.properties file. First it searches in ../tomcat/webapps/wubiq-server/WEB-INF/classes. Then searches in:
        ../tomcat/webapps/wubiq-server/WEB-INF/, ../tomcat/webapps/wubiq-server/WEB-INF/conf
        ../tomcat/webapps/wubiq-server/, ../tomcat/webapps/wubiq-server/conf
        ../tomcat/webapps/, ../tomcat/webapps/conf
        ../tomcat/, ../tomcat/conf
        ../, ../conf
        Overrides:
        getProperties in class BaseProperties
        Returns:
        the properties.
